text: Veltrusy (; ) is a small town in the Central Bohemian Region of the Czech Republic. It has about 2,200 inhabitants. It is situated 25 km north of Prague. ==Sights== The main attraction of the town is a Baroque château Veltrusy Mansion with its large castle park and deer-park. The château is open to the public for visits. ==References== ==External links== * *Official website *Veltrusy Mansion website (in Czech) *alternative Veltrusy Mansion website (in English) Category:Cities and towns in the Czech Republic
title: Veltrusy
